pages.title: Tinkers Alloying (TAIGA)
pages.text: TAIGA is an addon for tinkers construct. It aims to find new minable ores, new alloys and a bunch of new tinker traits for them.

pages.title: Features
pages.text: - 20 new Ores and Blocks$(br2)- 28 alloys$(br2)- Unique Traits$(br2)- In-game Tinkers Construct book integration
